description: Sharing what I learn along the way. Building in public means documenting the journey.

posts.title: Why I Build in Public
posts.excerpt: The benefits of sharing your journey openly - attracting collaborators, getting feedback, and staying accountable.

posts.title: AI as a Co-Pilot, Not a Replacement
posts.excerpt: How I use AI tools to accelerate my workflow without losing the craft of building products.

posts.title: Lessons from Failed Products
posts.excerpt: Every failed project taught me something valuable. Here's what I learned from shipping imperfectly.
